hero.name: Mehakjot Singh
hero.title: Senior Senior Full Stack Engineer
hero.intro: Architecting resilient distributed systems and building high-performance, accessible user experiences. Specialized in React, Spring Boot, and Cloud Architecture.

about.content: With over 6 years of experience in full-stack engineering, I've led the development of scalable enterprise solutions across fintech and e-commerce domains. My technical foundation is built on modern React architectures and robust Java/Spring Boot microservices. I have a deep passion for system design, real-time communication (WebRTC/Socket.io), and performance optimization. I pride myself on writing clean, maintainable code and mentoring junior developers to foster an engineering-first culture.

projects.title: High-Frequency Trading Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time fintech dashboard for monitoring millisecond-latency trades with advanced charting and risk management.
projects.challenges: Synchronizing massive data streams without blocking the UI thread and ensuring sub-second state updates.
projects.architecture: Reactive architecture utilizing Reactor/Flux on backend; React canvas for rendering complex charts efficiently.

projects.title: Synchro - Remote Pair Programming
projects.description: Collaborative IDE with integrated video/audio chat, code broadcasting, and shared terminal access.
projects.challenges: Handling NAT traversal for high-quality video P2P and managing CRDTs for collaborative editing consistency.
projects.architecture: Hybrid P2P-SFU architecture for video scalability. OT (Operational Transformation) for concurrent code editing.

engineering.philosophy: I believe that software engineering is a craft. I prioritize 'The Three Pillars': Observability, Scalability, and Maintainability. My approach involves early bottlenecks detection, rigorous unit testing, and leveraging infrastructure-as-code to ensure consistent deployment environments.
